metadata.title: CVE-2018-16469 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: The merge.recursive function in the merge package <1.2.1 can be trickedinto adding or modifying properties of the Object prototype. Theseproperties will be present on all objects allowing for a denial of serviceattack.

criterions.comment: node-merge package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
